camera_gear.model: Sony A7R V / Canon EOS R5 / Nikon Z8
camera_gear.lens: Wide-Angle 35mm f/1.4 GM / TS-E 35mm f/2.8L / PC Nikkor 35mm f/2.8

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Late winter morning (10:00-11:00 AM, the solar altitude angle is relatively low)
lighting_setup.weather: Clear cloudless winter sky, high atmospheric clarity
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Low-angle hard sunlight from camera left/southwest, creating long pronounced shadows
lighting_setup.quality: Hard directional soft warm sunlight, crisp shadow edges, high contrast between illuminated facades and shadow areas

color_grading.palette: Cool-warm contrast palette: clear cyan-blue sky, cool gray shadows
color_grading.saturation: Natural saturation (90-95%), authentic color reproduction, slight enhancement on sky blues
color_grading.contrast: High contrast, deepened shadows (-20), elevated highlights, S-curve emphasizing textural depth

texture_quality.details: Ultra-sharp facade grid texture,  glazed window reflections, asphalt aggregate detail, clear visibility of interior furniture through glass
texture_quality.surface_descriptions: Clear reflective glazing, asphalt texture with soft specular highlights

composition_guide.balance: Asymmetrical dynamic balance, strong diagonal shadow lines leading into frame

atmosphere.mood: Authentic urban solitude, crisp documentary realism, everyday China city life melancholy
atmosphere.feeling: Quiet observation, geometric urban order, seasonal crispness, contemplative street photography atmosphere

technical_quality.post_processing: Perspective correction for vertical converging lines, clarity enhancement on architectural grid, shadow deepening for contrast, highlight recovery on sunlit facades, color temperature balancing between warm sunlight and cool shadows, chromatic aberration control
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight 5200K with slight warm shift (+5) to preserve winter sun warmth, separate shadow tinting toward cool blue
technical_quality.tone: S-curve tonal response with compressed highlights on bright facade, open shadows with detail preservation in street level, medium-high contrast for crisp winter light
technical_quality.vignette: No vignette or extremely subtle (-5%) to maintain documentary authenticity
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High dynamic range capture (14+ stops) preserving detail simultaneously in bright sunlit building surfaces and deep shadow areas under benches and trees
